body:
Day 13 - Manga 311* Half of it are just some shitty random images and the story that occurs at first seems kinda rushes. The art style wasn't bad but it wasn't that good either. 2/10.
This dude not understanding that this is shit and that it being made 15 years ago is not an argument, Lmao.
this dudes criticizing a 15 years old doujinshi, Lmao
art is good but it feels like it just jumps all over the place? idk, i think i need knowledge of Touhou to actually enjoy some of these 4/10
Idk what's going on to be honest 4/10
